message: Dear Bob, I'm excited to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item holds significant value to us and we believe it would be a perfect fit for your needs. We're offering it to you at a special price of $9,500, which we believe is a fair compromise between its intrinsic value and what you perceive its worth to be. We're confident this opportunity won't last long, so please let us know if you're interested in securing it.
